Kaggle Collector

Kaggle Collector#

class pycurator.collectors.term_type_collectors.kaggle.KaggleCollector(search_terms: Optional[collections.abc.Collection[pycurator._typing.SearchTerm]] = None, search_types: Optional[collections.abc.Collection[pycurator._typing.SearchType]] = None)#

Kaggle collector for search term and type queries.

Parameters

  • search_terms (list-like, optional (default=None)) – Terms to search over. Can be (re)set via set_search_terms() or passed in directly to search functions.

  • search_types (list-like, optional (default=None)) – Data types to search over. Can be (re)set via set_search_types() or passed in directly to search functions to override set parameter.

Notes

For validating Kaggle requests, read the official documentation on authentication at https://www.kaggle.com/docs/api.

Attributes
search_terms

Property method for search terms.

search_types

Getter for search_types.
